alert.note: Alert for South Lincoln County; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 5:04AM MST until January 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. with isolated amounts around 10 inches * WHERE...Upper Green River Basin Foothills and South Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM Monday. The heaviest snow looks to occur this morning, then again on Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter travel conditions are expected, with slick roads and periods of low visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South Lincoln County; Upper Green River Basin Foothills
